Title: Stole Beer From a Golfer
Plot: Earl attempts to help Scott (guest star Johnny Galecki) get over his preoccupation with golf--an obsession caused when he and Randy started fixing Scott?s golf game to get free beer. But after becoming so thoroughly entangled in Scott?s personal life that he drives Randy away, Earl realizes that he may be the one with the obsession.
GuestStars: Raymond Ma,  Kristina Hayes,  David Reivers,  Johnny Galecki,  Art Frankel,  Jill  Benjamin
